text: The 2022 Copa América Femenina will be the 9th edition of the CONMEBOL Copa América Femenina (also referred to as the Copa América Femenina), the quadrennial international football competition for women's national teams in South America affiliated with CONMEBOL. It is expected to be a qualifier event for 2023 FIFA Women's World Cup in Australia and New Zealand. Brazil are the defending champions. ==Teams== All ten CONMEBOL women's national teams are eligible to enter. * * * (holders) * * * * * * * ==References== Category:Copa América Femenina tournaments Category:2022 in women's association football
title: 2022 Copa América Femenina
